documentation.text:
Called when an initiated change reaches finality and is activated. 
 Only valid when msg.sender == SUPER_USER (EIP96, 2**160 - 2)

    /// Also called when the contract is first enabled for consensus. In this case,
 the "change" finalized is the activation of the initial set.

 the "change" finalized is the activation of the initial set.

finalizeChange().notice: Called when an initiated change reaches finality and is activated.  Only valid when msg.sender == SUPER_USER (EIP96, 2**160 - 2)     /// Also called when the contract is first enabled for consensus. In this case, the "change" finalized is the activation of the initial set.
